location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 5: Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire, to William Newnham, Chief Secretary to the Government, Bombay

physicalDescription.extent: Condition: This folio has suffered damage at its edges, which has resulted in some of the text being lost.

mods.abstract: This letter concerns the recovery of items plundered from a dow [dhow]. Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire, relays news received from the Imam of Muscat [Sa‘īd bin Sulṭān Āl Sa‘īd], via the Native Agent at Muscat.
